(#{item.questionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.questionnireCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relyQuestionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relyOptionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relyResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.questionScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
